name: Transmorgification Situation
description:
A short point and click adventure game I made for Ludum Dare 35. (The theme being Shapeshift)

Upon first releasing this, I wasn't able to incorporate the music I spent so long to make... Unfortunate. However, with newfound knowledge, I managed to get the sound to work for this build (for me at least. I don't know if it'll work for you)
